name: PC Builder
description: A MERN app that allows a user to build a custom PC with full CRUD routes. This was a group project organized using Airtable and Github branches

name: TUNR. Playlist
description: TUNR. For all your playlist needs! Allows you to create a list database of songs you listen to and add certain songs to your favorites! Frontend created in React and backend in Rails with full CRUD functionality.

name: Lord of the Rings Map
description: A fun interactive map that uses jQuery and some CSS to create the journey of Bilbo Baggins and his companions.

name: My Portfolio
description: This is my portfolio created using React as my front end and using rails as a back end to hold all my projects. I implemented a few of the React libraries such as react-bootstrap and react-icons. I also applied some Styled Components along with some traditional CSS which also includes some animations.
